entry.data:
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
